summary: Completed frontend testing of SoundMirror client management features. Clients page loads correctly with proper UI elements, navigation works, but client creation functionality is broken due to IndexedDB/JavaScript issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Client creation fails - modal remains open after clicking 'Add Client' button
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot create new clients, blocking core functionality
critical_bugs.symptoms: Form submission does not work, no client appears in list, modal stays open

ui_bugs.issue: Modal close button selector not working consistently
ui_bugs.workaround: Cancel button works for closing modal

integration_issues.issue: IndexedDB operations may be failing silently
integration_issues.symptoms: No JavaScript errors visible but client creation doesn't complete

passed_tests: Clients page loads with correct title and layout
Empty state displays properly with 'No clients yet' message
Add First Client button visible in empty state
Modal form fields are accessible and can be filled
Letter Practice page loads and is accessible
Modal Cancel button works for closing
Page routing and URL changes work correctly
Extended practice content constants are available
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix client creation functionality in ClientsPage.jsx. The handleCreateClient function is not working - investigate IndexedDB operations, form validation, and JavaScript errors. Client creation is the core feature and must work before other client management features can be tested.
